name: Run Little Zombie
description:
Run Little Zombie

Game for Ludum Dare 50 - The Combo,.

Theme - Delay The Inevitable

Short auto runner in the style of the OG crash bandicoot levels, can you stop our favourite little zombie from dying again, no... but you can at least let him survive for as long as possible.

Avoid the obstacles and collect some brains before Death sends you back where you belong.

Controls - W.A.S.D, Space to jump
